short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add items from any website to your smart shopping cart

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SmartCart is a powerful Chrome extension that revolutionizes your online shopping experience. With this tool, you can effortlessly add products from any website to a single, unified cart, streamlining your purchase process across multiple online stores.
Key Features:

Universal Shopping Cart: Browse products across different websites and manage them in a single, convenient cart interface. Simplify your online shopping experience by keeping track of items from various stores in one place
Centralized Shopping Cart: View and manage all your selected items from different websites in one convenient location.
Easy Price Comparison: Compare prices of similar products from various websites side-by-side in your universal cart.
Secure and Private: Your cart data is stored locally and securely on your device, ensuring your privacy.
Dark Mode: Enjoy a comfortable shopping experience with our sleek dark mode option.
Share Cart: Easily share your curated list of items with friends and family.
Save for Later: Move items to a "Saved" list for future consideration without cluttering your main cart.

Why Install SmartCart?

Save Time: No more juggling multiple tabs or forgetting items on different sites.
Make Informed Decisions: Easily compare prices and products across various online stores.
Streamline Your Shopping: Simplify your online shopping process with a centralized cart system.
Enhance Your Browser: Add a powerful shopping tool to Chrome without slowing down your browsing experience.

Whether you're a savvy deal-hunter, a meticulous comparison shopper, or someone who loves efficiency, SmartCart is the perfect companion for your online shopping adventures. Install now and transform the way you shop online! Be Smart!
